discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Th failures for `coq-master / mathcomp-abel` and `coq-8.12 / odd-order` look unrelated but I don't really understand them (they both fail at step "Checking presence of CI target {mathcomp-abel,odd-order}")

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> Th failures for `coq-master / mathcomp-abel` and `coq-8.12 / odd-order` look unrelated but I don't really understand them (they both fail at step "Checking presence of CI target {mathcomp-abel,odd-order}")

I dropped error messages a bit too eagerly, sorry!
https://github.com/coq-community/coq-nix-toolbox/pull/73

Meanwhile you can do the `nix-build` command manually without throwing out the output :smile: 
```bash
$ nix-build --no-out-link --argstr bundle "coq-master" --argstr job "mathcomp-abel"
these derivations will be built:
  /nix/store/a319n9bcxdja4i2y37xdkap7sig07939-coqdev-mathcompdev-abel-dev.drv
these paths will be fetched (168.88 MiB download, 633.94 MiB unpacked):
  /nix/store/rxzkrfkhzd2agc9haj351nay2x689h2y-coq-dev
```
But I don't see the problem either :laughing:

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: @proux01  If you rebase on top of master you should be able to see the error message now.

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment:
Thanks, looks like things fixed themselves?
Anyway, CI green

commits.author: proux01
commits.message:
[CI] Remove no longer useful Nix overlays

* multinomials fixed upstream
  https://github.com/math-comp/multinomials/pull/49
  https://github.com/math-comp/multinomials/pull/50
* paramcoq fixed in nixpkgs
  https://github.com/NixOS/nixpkgs/pull/142174
